product_name: Spy Raider Snow Goggles - Spy+POW Frame
long_description: With a large, view-maximizing cylindrical lens, the Spy Raider Spy+POW goggles deliver clear vision and come with a spare lens. As a bonus, each goggle sold contributes to Protect Our Winters (POW).
short_description: With a large, view-maximizing cylindrical lens, the Spy Raider Spy+POW goggles deliver clear vision and come with a spare lens. As a bonus, each goggle sold contributes to Protect Our Winters (POW).
